content:
all in the details

BOOK BY DEC 31, 2017. STAY BETWEEN SEP 20, 2016 AND DEC 30, 2017

At The Gates Hotel South Beach – a DoubleTree by Hilton, we love our guests! For a limited time, book our brand new We Love Our Guests Package and enjoy an overnight stay at a discounted rate (10% off!), plus two complimentary welcome drinks* (available for redemption at our Lobby Bar) and waived resort fee!

Need assistance? Our dedicated reservations team is available around the clock:

Gates South Beach Service Centre 800-445-8667 or
info@gatessouthbeach.com

Contact Us
